  • themeinstall

        • Step 3
        • ThemeInstall

        themeinstall

        # Theme install

        # Step 1

        npm install -D vuepress

npm install vuepress-theme-vdoing -D

npm run dev # or yarn dev

npm run build

        # Step 2

        // config.js
module.exports = {
  theme: 'vdoing',
  themeConfig: {
     sidebar: 'structuring' //  'structuring' | { mode: 'structuring', collapsable: Boolean} | 'auto' | 自定义
  }
}

        提示

        Remove prev: and next: in Frontmatter because build error when run npm run build

        Child theme doesn't work (?), need further investigation. ❓

        # Step 3

        npm install -D vuepress-plugin-mathjax

        https://vuepress-community.netlify.app/en/plugins/mathjax/ (opens new window)
